    About Me

    • As a QA Engineer I love to discuss about software testing. Apart from that I also like learning programming. However in my opinion, comparing testers who can code to testers who donâ€™t code is plain wrong.

    • Personally I think Automated test is not meant to replace creative testing. Rather, it is a mean to take testing process to another level; to make it more efficient and effective.

    Repository
